docs.lead_paragraph: The Latest on the trial of a woman charged with cutting a stranger's unborn baby from her womb (all times local):

headline.main: The Latest: Boyfriend Testifies in Stolen Baby Case
headline.print_headline: The Latest: Boyfriend Testifies in Stolen Baby Case

docs.lead_paragraph: Karna, a farmer from Badgaon village in northern India, has few options but to sell his blood for money, after persistent drought left him unable to live off his land.

headline.main: Weather-Weary Indian Farmers Resort to New Cash Crop-Blood
headline.print_headline: Weather-Weary Indian Farmers Resort to New Cash Crop-Blood

docs.snippet: Karna, a farmer from Badgaon village in northern India, has few options but to sell his blood for money, after persistent drought left him unable to live off his land.

docs.lead_paragraph: A woman whose baby was cut from her womb by someone she just met testified Wednesday that she told herself she had to survive for the sake of her unborn daughter and tried to fight back.

headline.main: Woman Says She Fought Attacker, Tried to Protect Unborn Baby
headline.print_headline: Woman Says She Fought Attacker, Tried to Protect Unborn Baby

docs.snippet: A woman whose baby was cut from her womb by someone she just met testified Wednesday that she told herself she had to survive for the sake of her unborn daughter and tried to fight back.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Zika virus may be particularly adept at entrenching itself in parts of the body that are shielded from the immune system, making it harder to fight off and possibly lengthening the timeframe in which it can be transmitted, top U.S. experts said on Friday.

headline.main: Zika Virus May Hide in Organs Protected From the Immune System
headline.print_headline: Zika Virus May Hide in Organs Protected From the Immune System

docs.snippet: The Zika virus may be particularly adept at entrenching itself in parts of the body that are shielded from the immune system, making it harder to fight off and possibly lengthening the timeframe in which it can be transmitted, top U.S. experts said...

docs.lead_paragraph: A white college student goes out to party costumed as black rapper Lil Wayne, angering African-Americans who see it as evidence of insidious campus racism.

headline.main: College Racial Tensions to Play Out on TV Drama
headline.print_headline: College Racial Tensions to Play Out on TV Drama

docs.snippet: A white college student goes out to party costumed as black rapper Lil Wayne, angering African-Americans who see it as evidence of insidious campus racism.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Texas senator’s campaign is trying a new line of attack against Mr. Trump for his generally favorable view of Planned Parenthood.

headline.main: Ted Cruz Ad Goes After Donald Trump’s Stance on Planned Parenthood

docs.snippet: The Texas senator’s campaign is trying a new line of attack against Mr. Trump for his generally favorable view of Planned Parenthood.

docs.lead_paragraph: The illness appeared in the country too recently for most pregnant women who contracted it to determine the risk of birth defects.

headline.main: Zika Virus in Colombia Presents Complicated Choice About Abortion
headline.print_headline: Pregnant and Facing Dilemma Over Zika

docs.abstract: Nearly 3,000 pregnant women in Colombia who have been infected with Zika virus face dilemma over whether to have abortion for fear their child will be born with microcephaly; compounding decision is fact that no cases have yet been confirmed in country; Colombia is one of the few Latin American nations that allow women to terminate their pregnancies under variety of circumstances.
docs.snippet: The illness appeared in the country too recently for most pregnant women who contracted it to determine the risk of birth defects.

docs.lead_paragraph: The fight between Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders is giving a state’s Hispanics a chance to draw attention to their hardships and priorities.

headline.main: Young Latinos Power Both Democrats in Nevada Caucus Campaign
headline.print_headline: A Stage, and a Test, for Young Latinos in Nevada

docs.abstract: Presidential candidates Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders are courting young Hispanic-American voters for upcoming Democratic caucuses in Nevada, where large Hispanic population could influence their respective campaigns.
docs.snippet: The fight between Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders is giving a state’s Hispanics a chance to draw attention to their hardships and priorities.

byline.contributor: Nicholas Confessore contributed reporting from Henderson, Nev.

docs.abstract: If the Senate Republican leaders refuse to consider a Supreme Court nomination from President Obama, what effect could that have on the November elections?
docs.snippet: If the Senate Republican leaders refuse to consider a Supreme Court nomination from President Obama, what effect could that have on the November elections?

docs.lead_paragraph: Ireland's Labour Party, junior partner in Prime Minister Enda Kenny's ruling coalition, promised on Monday to hold a referendum to boost access to abortion if voters return it to government this month.

headline.main: Irish Junior Government Party Promises Abortion Vote if Re-elected
headline.print_headline: Irish Junior Government Party Promises Abortion Vote if Re-elected

docs.snippet: Ireland's Labour Party, junior partner in Prime Minister Enda Kenny's ruling coalition, promised on Monday to hold a referendum to boost access to abortion if voters return it to government this month.
